title: 244.056 PREDATORY OFFENDER; SEEKING HOUSING IN DIFFERENT JURISDICTION.
text: If a corrections agency supervising an offender who is required to register as a predatory offender under section 243.166 and who is classified by the department as a public risk monitoring case has knowledge that the offender is seeking housing arrangements in a location under the jurisdiction of another corrections agency, the agency shall notify the other agency of this and initiate a supervision transfer request.
